title: Gynecology | RWJ University Hospital, New Brunswick, New Jersey
description: The gynecology specialists at Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital New Brunswick provide expert, compassionate care for health issues related to the female reproductive system.
cleaned_text: Gynecology Services at Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital The gynecology specialists at Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital New Brunswick provide expert, compassionate care for health issues related to the female reproductive system. We offer preventive and diagnostic gynecologic services as well as minimally invasive outpatient treatments and surgery. Our comprehensive services include subspecialties in endometriosis, vulvar and vaginal health, and pediatric adolescent gynecology. With a combination of experienced staff, state-of-the-art technology and access to clinical trials and research, RWJUH provides the care you need, close to home. Why Choose Us for Your Gynecologic Needs? RWJUH, in partnership with [Rutgers Robert Wood Johnson Medical School](https://rwjms.rutgers.edu/) and [Rutgers Health](https://rutgershealth.org/), is one of the premier academic medical centers in the United States. Our gynecologists are educators and researchers as well as practitioners, always learning about the latest treatments and advocating for the most advanced care for their patients. In addition, our doctors work closely with colleagues from the [Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey](https://cinj.org/), the only National Cancer Institute (NCI)-designated Comprehensive Cancer Center in the state to provide the highest level of care to patients with cancer. Gynecologic Specialty Services - Endometriosis In conjunction with the Endometriosis Center at Rutgers Robert Wood Johnson Medical School, we provide comprehensive treatment for endometriosis, a chronic and painful gynecological condition. - Vulvar and Vaginal Health The Center for Vulvar and Vaginal Health is the only center of its kind in New Jersey, treating rare and painful conditions like vulvodynia. - [Pediatric Adolescent Gynecology](/bristol-myers-squibb-childrens-hospital-at-rwjuh/treatment-care/adolescent-medicine/) Teens have specific health needs. Our doctors provide supportive, age-appropriate care for teens and young adults considering their emotional, physical, and nutritional needs. We take care to respect their individuality, identity and development. - [Minimally Invasive Robotic Surgery](https://www.rwjbh.org/~/rwj-university-hospital-new-brunswick/treatment-care/robotic-surgery/) Our surgeons employ advanced robotic surgery methods that are less invasive than traditional surgery, leading to faster healing and recovery times. Our Gynecology team works closely with colleagues in other fields, including: - Reproductive endocrinology and infertility - Female pelvic medicine and reconstructive surgery (urogynecology) - Gynecologic oncology - Maternal-fetal medicine (perinatology) You can expect cutting-edge treatments and comprehensive diagnostic procedures. Whether you are looking for a routine checkup or have a serious concern about your health, we are ready to help you. Physicians Let's be healthy together.
